name: Verizon Community Discounts
description: $10-25/month off unlimited plans plus 25% off accessories
fullDescription: Verizon offers ongoing monthly discounts on unlimited wireless plans for military, veterans, first responders, teachers, and nurses. All programs provide $10-25/month off plus 25% off accessories.
whatTheyOffer:
- $10/month off (1 phone line)
- $25/month off (2-3 phone lines)
- $20/month off (4+ phone lines)
- 25% off accessories (online only)
- Available for new and existing customers
- Eligible groups: military/veterans, first responders, teachers, nurses
howToGetIt:
1. Visit verizon.com/discounts to see all available programs
2. Verify status through ID.me
3. Military: active duty, veterans, retirees, National Guard, Reserve
4. First responders: firefighters, EMTs/EMS, state/local police
5. Teachers: K-12 and college/university educators
6. Nurses: RNs, LPNs, nurse practitioners, respiratory therapists
7. Discount continues as long as status is verified
keywords: Verizon, military discount, veteran, first responder, teacher, nurse, firefighter, police, EMT, cell phone, wireless plan, ID.me, healthcare worker
